titles.title: Utah School and Institutional Trust Lands Administration Exchange Act of 2023
A bill to provide for the exchange of certain Federal land and State land in the State of Utah.
Utah School and Institutional Trust Lands Administration Exchange Act of 2023
Utah School and Institutional Trust Lands Administration Exchange Act of 2023

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Senate Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 118-285.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Manchin without amendment. With written report No. 118-153.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 305.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

bill.summary:
Utah School and Institutional Trust Lands Administration Exchange Act of 2023
This bill ratifies an agreement between the Utah School and Institutional Trust Lands Administration, the state of Utah, and the Department of the Interior for the exchange of certain federal and state lands in Utah.
The bill provides for the equalization of values of such lands.
The bill provides for the withdrawal of
federal land to be conveyed to Utah from mineral entry prior to the exchange, and state land conveyed to the United States from all forms of appropriation and disposal.
